remark.html:
Set alias

POST _aliases
{
  "actions": [
    {
      "add": {
        "index": "vacancylist6",
        "alias": "vaclist"
      }
    }
  ]
}

Replace alias

{
  "actions": [
    {
      "remove": {
        "index": "vacancylist4",
        "alias": "vaclist"
      }
    },
    {
      "add": {
        "index": "vacancylist5",
        "alias": "vaclist"
      }
    }
  ]
}
